body:
I made this thread because it is very annoying when 1 service goes down (where it be ts, or in game) and there are a gazillion threads asking about it.
Bump this thread if you have a query about a service being down, or just to notify the community.


Current Down Services: 
TS3
26/06/14 (English Date Format)
